title: Winter Market at Kiener Plaza
description: A charming outdoor market with local vendors, festive treats, and hot cocoa.

title: St. Louis Symphony Christmas Concert
description: A night of heartwarming Christmas music by the renowned St. Louis Symphony.

title: Christmas Day Celebration
description: A day to celebrate Christmas with family, friends, and the community.

title: New Year's Eve at Ballpark Village
description: Ring in the New Year with live music, dancing, and fireworks!

title: Winter Wonderland Lights Display
description: Drive through a dazzling display of holiday lights and festive decorations.

title: Hot Chocolate 5K Run
description: Enjoy a brisk run followed by delicious hot chocolate and treats.

title: Holiday Ice Skating
location: Steinberg Skating Rink, St. Louis, MO
description: Skate under the stars while enjoying holiday music and treats.

title: Polar Express Movie Night
description: Watch the holiday classic and enjoy festive snacks with the family.

title: Holiday Cookie Decorating Workshop
location: Missouri Baking Company, St. Louis, MO
description: Learn to decorate cookies like a pro and take your creations home.

title: Caroling in the City
description: Join a festive group of carolers spreading holiday cheer downtown.

title: St. Louis Blues Hockey Game
description: Cheer on the Blues as they take on a rival team!

title: Art Exhibit at SLAM
location: St. Louis Art Museum, St. Louis, MO
description: Explore stunning artwork from local and international artists.

title: Food Truck Friday
location: Tower Grove Park, St. Louis, MO
description: Sample delicious meals from a variety of local food trucks.

title: Gateway Arch Guided Tour
description: Learn the history behind this iconic landmark with a guided tour.

title: Science Center Star Show
location: St. Louis Science Center, St. Louis, MO
description: Experience the wonder of the night sky in the planetarium.

title: Local Farmers Market
description: Shop fresh produce and handmade goods at this historic market.

title: Open Mic Night
description: Enjoy performances by local musicians and comedians.

title: Yoga in the Park
description: Start your morning with a relaxing yoga session in the park.

title: Historic Brewery Tour
description: Take a guided tour of one of the oldest breweries in the city.

title: Chess Club Open Play
location: Chess Club and Scholastic Center, St. Louis, MO
description: Test your skills or learn the game with fellow chess enthusiasts.
